title: App Crash on Photo Upload
content: Clear cache, update to latest app version >= 2.5.1, check photo size < 10MB, try safe mode.

title: Billing: Unexpected Charge
content: Verify plan, check add-ons, examine invoice line items, apply refund policy if mischarge.

title: Product Roadmap cadence
content: Minor features ship bi-weekly; major features quarterly. Public changelog updated every Friday.
